classroom.name: h1
classroom.style: color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 56px; line-height: 58px; letter-spacing: 2px; margin: 0;

classroom.name: button1
classroom.style: color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; letter-spacing: 1px; height: 48px; max-width: 160px; width: 100%; border: none; display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: product-container
classroom.style: max-width: 1110px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline: auto;

classroom.name: hero-section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-top:16px; gap:32px;

classroom.name: hero-title
classroom.style: color: black; font-weight: bold; font-size:40px; line-height:44px; letter-spacing: 1.43px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div
classroom.style: display: flex; align-items: center: justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 47px; gap: 16px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-div
classroom.style: min-height: 48px; max-width: 120px; background-color: #F1F1F1; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width:100%;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-buttons
classroom.style: border: none; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25); cursor: pointer; transition: 150ms; margin-inline: 12.5px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-count-input
classroom.style: border: none; text-align: center; outline:none; width: 40px; padding:0; margin:0; font-family: Manrope; font-size: 13px; font-weight:bold; letter-spacing: 1px; background-color: transparent;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-cart-button
classroom.style: background-color: #D87D4A; width: 160px; min-height: 48px; color: white; border: none; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; cursor: pointer; transition: 150ms;

classroom.name: additional-features
classroom.style: max-width: 635px; width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column;

classroom.name: p-description
classroom.style: color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); margin-top: 32px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 15px; line-height: 25px; white-space: pre-line;

classroom.name: additional-box
classroom.style: max-width: 350px; width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column;

classroom.name: additional-box-p
classroom.style: display: flex; gap: 24px; align-items: center; margin-top: 8px;

children.style: margin-block: 79px 56px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 15px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); line-height: 25px;
